subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Steven Stamkos, the No. 1 overall pick in the 2008 draft, scored his 15th goal at 2:56 of overtime to give the Lightning their second straight win.
snippet: Steven Stamkos, the No. 1 overall pick in the 2008 draft, scored his 15th goal at 2:56 of overtime to give the Lightning their second straight win.
